CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1962, pg. 11 reads:" En Route To Europe is this charming family trio, Mrs. Andrew J .Howard III, daughter Mary and son Andrew IV, of San Francisco. Mrs .Howard is the former Ruth Brown, daughter of the late rector of Holy Cross, Robert D. Brown.  The trio stopped in Pittsburgh en route to New York where they boarded the luxury liner Queen Elizabeth, on Aug. 1, for a year in France. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. Andrew J .Howard III, with daughter Mary Howard and son Andrew Howard IV, gathered around bed with two suitcases in Penn Sheraton Hotel
